spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cerebrovore's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The feylith cerebrovore has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The feylith cerebrovore has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15}) and must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until this grapple ends. The cerebrovore can also choose to pull the creature up to 5 feet towards it.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition poisoned} target {@condition grappled} by the cerebrovore. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the cerebrovore kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

trait.name: State Flux
entries: The quickling has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Blurred Movement
entries: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}. Additionally, The quickling is so light that it doesn't take any damage when it falls. It can also jump up to half its movement speed with a long jump, and 20 feet with a high jump.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the quickling instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Feylith Lasso
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage, and the target is {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 14}). While the target is {@condition restrained}, the quickling can use its bonus action to cause it to take the same damage. The quickling can only have one target {@condition restrained} at a time with its lasso.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Precise Strikes
entries: When the centaur attacks a creature that has 0 movement speed, it automatically hits with its attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes three pike attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage. On a hit, the centaur can choose to knock the target {@condition prone} instead of deal damage to it.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Entangling Arrow (3/day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the creature's speed is reduced to 0 as vines wrap around its legs. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 16} Strength check, removing the vines on a success.
